title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is $$8$$.

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are $$1$$, $$8$$, $$28$$, $$56$$, $$70$$, $$56$$, $$28$$, $$8$$, $$1$$.

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___$$ $$a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Plugging in the coefficients.
text: By plugging in the coefficients found earlier, we get $$a^8+8a^7 b^1+28a^6 b^2+56a^5 b^3+70a^4 b^4+56a^3 b^5+28a^2 b^6+8a^1 b^7+b^8$$.
